articles.title: Victim's widow files the first lawsuit after January's D.C.-area midair crash - NPR
articles.description: Family members of a passenger who died in the January collision are suing American Airlines, PSA Airlines, and the federal government. It's the first of what could be dozens of lawsuits.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON Casey Crafton was one of 60 passengers who were killed when an American Airlines regional jet collided with a U.S. Army Blackhawk helicopter near Washington, D.C. in January.
On Wednesday… [+2825 chars]

articles.author: Tim De Chant
articles.title: Trump administration wants 10% stake in American lithium miner that sells to GM - TechCrunch
articles.description: Lithium Americas asked for a small change to the loan repayment period, which spurred the latest Trump administration request for equity.
articles.content: The Trump administration might be fond of calling the energy transition the green new scam, but that isnt stopping it from seeking a significant stake in what promises to be the largest lithium mine … [+1354 chars]
